attributes.action: Standardise the four day work week
attributes.background: Four day work week, six hour work day. Increased productivity for business (studies show that employees working a four-day work week are more productive and happier overall). Cutting child care issues and costs, health problems from work related stress and an overall healthier work life balance.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government aren't responsible for the issue you raise. UK law places limits on the total amount of time someone can work during a week and the minimum amount they can be paid an hour, but it doesn't specify how many or which days of the week they have to work. This would be a decision for employers.

We could accept a petition calling for the maximum number of hours worked during a week to be reduced, if this is something you would like to see happen.
